scenes.background: You decide to focus on the presentation first. [Bob] looks a bit frustrated.
scenes.description: [Bob] says, 'I understand your point, but the report is really urgent. How should we handle this?'

options.text: Let's delegate the report to someone else while we focus on the presentation.
options.analysis: You show good social skills and self-regulation by delegating, but empathy is lower as you shift the responsibility.

options.text: I think we should split the tasks and handle both simultaneously.
options.analysis: You display good emotional perception and social skills, but your self-regulation is a bit affected by multitasking.

options.text: Let's focus on the presentation now and tackle the report later. We can manage both in sequence.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and a clear focus, but emotional perception is lower as you delay the urgent task.
